trans-unit.source: Email address {0} is already in use!
Your password needs to be at least {0} characters long.
trans-unit.target: Das Passwort muss mindestens {0} Zeichen lang sein.

trans-unit.source: Your password must be at most {0} characters long.
trans-unit.target: Das Passwort darf höchstens {0} Zeichen lang sein.

trans-unit.source: Your password needs to contain at least {0} lowercase letters.
trans-unit.target: Das Passwort muss mindestens {0} Kleinbuchstaben enthalten.

trans-unit.source: Your password needs to contain at least {0} uppercase letters.
trans-unit.target: Das Passwort muss mindestens {0} Großbuchstaben enthalten.

trans-unit.source: Your password needs to contain at least {0} numbers.
trans-unit.target: Das Passwort muss mindestens {0} Zahlen enthalten.

trans-unit.source: Your password needs to contain at least {0} special characters (e.g. %!=).
trans-unit.target: Das Passwort muss mindestens {0} Sonderzeichen (z.B. %!=) enthalten.
